name: Jpiekarski.github.io
body:
# Welcome As I complete them, I will be linking below to some of the full-stack web apps I've made as a student at the Software Craftsmanship Guild in Akron, Ohio. The tools we use include Java, Spring, MySQL, Tomcat, HTML/CSS and JS. # Project 1: Address Book

Link

A simple CRUD application, this project lets a user see the addresses in the book and sort them. It also had an administrator role who can edit the existing addresses and add new addresses to the book.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
